100.text: When the Hero Gauge is MAXed \nyou can obtain a Hero Skill!

101.text: You can look forward to the race results \nafter gaining a Hero Skill even more excitedly!

102.text: Some Hero Skills can be activated \nby using Race Items!

103.text: The Hero Gauge will be at MAX soon!

104.text: It looks like your team's strong desire for \nracing will be a great strength!

200.text: You can find a lot of info regarding \nLeague of Heroes here!

300.text: When reaching PLATINUM1 you can obtain a \nunique title with one eligible Umamusume's name!

302.text: An Umamusume's "Tale" title can be obtained \nafter the Main Stage ranks are determined!

303.text: You can check the League Scores obtained \nby each Umamusume in the Main Stage here!

400.text: You can use Race Items in the Main Stage.

401.text: You can change your team name until \nthe Main Stage ends

402.text: Your League Score is a sum of all the \nscore obtained from finishing positions.

403.text: Weather and going are \nrandomized every 5 races.

404.text: You need to select 3 Umamusume \nto register a team.

500.text: The Extra Stage is a one-shot race \nwith 12 participants.

501.text: Weather and going are randomized every race.

502.text: Teams can be changed until \nthe registration period ends.

503.text: Race Items aren't usable in the Extra Stage.
